Rule.Name: Tool Accessibility
Rule.Summary: Features should be accessible to the cutting tool in the preferred machining orientation.

Rule.Name: Narrow Regions In Pockets
Rule.Summary: To minimize the use of small tools, distance between features / model faces of milled regions should be >= 3.0 mm and the ratio of depth of milling region to its width should be <= 10.0.

Parameter.Name: Select the drill diameter to delete
